item.name: Admin / Authentication
item.description: API Endpoints for Admin Authentication / Token Management

request.description:
InvoiceShelf uses API Tokens for authentication.
The endpoint will return the plain-text API token which may then be stored and used to make additional API requests.

Internally, InvoiceShelf uses Laravel Sanctum package for handling authentication.
You can check this URL to know more: https://laravel.com/docs/8.x/sanctum#how-it-works-api-tokens
This will invalidate the API Token so it cannot be used anymore.
Check if the token is valid.
